AAc.caption: Board Code
AAc.doc: The board code is a required value that must be a unique code that is at least 15 characters long.
AAc.name: board_code

ABk.caption: Viewers
ABk.doc: Viewers may view a whiteboard, but may not edit or clear the board. The inputed data for this field must be a list of user emails (texts). Note that roles are optional.
ABk.name: viewers

ABl.caption: Editors
ABl.doc: Editors may view and edit whiteboards, but may not clear the board. The inputed data for this field must be a list of user emails (texts). Note that roles are optional.
ABl.name: editors

ABm.caption: Facilitators
ABm.doc: Editors may view, edit and clear whiteboards. The inputed data for this field must be a list of user emails (texts). Note that roles are optional.
ABm.name: facilitators
